content:
That sounds absolutely magical! Big Sur is such a stunning location, and I can only imagine how romantic it must have been to get proposed to there. Being caught off guard can make the moment even more special, and I'm sure it's a memory you'll treasure forever.

Exchanging vows during the ceremony is definitely a highlight of the wedding day. It's such an intimate and emotional moment, and it's beautiful that you're looking forward to it. Have you and Alex started thinking about your vows yet? Are you planning to write your own or use traditional vows?

And speaking of romance, what was the most surprising or thoughtful part of the proposal for you? Was there a particular detail that Alex planned that really touched your heart?
